website_summaries.verdict: No drum set is complete without a cowbell attached and ready to deliver the crisp tones you need, and you get your money’s worth with this inexpensive model.
cons: Note that there is no clapper, which is common

customer_reviews.title: built very well and sounds great. i put a piece of adhesive backed felt ...
customer_reviews.text: Mississippi queen , honky tonk woman, don't fear the reaper. and the list goes on. classic rock sound. built very well and sounds great. i put a piece of adhesive backed felt i got at a craft store in the inside bottom to take out the excess ring which wasn't too bad , but i like to tweak my set to perfection
customer_reviews.author: justa guy

customer_reviews.title: Deeper Cowbell Sound, Great Mounting Ability
customer_reviews.text: I am a band director and needed a decent cowbell quickly. This has a nice heavier sound to it. A big plus for me is that it has a way to mount it so I can mount it onto a percussion stand instead of just having a student hold it which is a big benefit if a student needs to make a quick instrument change. It looks great and I enjoy the deeper, non-clangy sound of it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Messenger

customer_reviews.title: Solid and good price
customer_reviews.text: Great sounding cowbell. Quality is good. Used it for a few recordings. Good price because others I felt were massively overpriced.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando H. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Cowbell
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his cowbell and it was fast delivery
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: It’s the cowbell.
customer_reviews.text: It’s the only cowbell I think I’ll need. Seriously it sounds awesome for rock and fits in to jazz well too!
customer_reviews.author: Allan England

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for great price!
customer_reviews.text: Considered several cowbells that were much more expensive and this one turned out to be exactly what I needed for about half the price. Strong rock sound with a deeper tone than some that are more suited to latin/salsa grooves and a higher tone.
customer_reviews.author: SD Italia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Cowbell!!
customer_reviews.text: If there's one thing everyone needs in their lives, it's more cowbell. This is a sturdy instrument with a good tone and it's very reasonably priced. We have multiple amateur musicians in our family, and we've all enjoyed channeling our inner Will Ferrell while rocking out. It's fun to play and has been a great addition to our musical instrument collection.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good, works well, priced well
customer_reviews.text: This cowbell has good tone, it's not the best quality, but it is reasonable for the price. I bought this for my husband and he loves it. It functions the way that it should, and was easy to attach. He was very happy with this gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Nichole Swarnes

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Good quality craftsmanship, good sound,should take a beating and last for years
customer_reviews.author: Dana G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Good item. Just as shown in the pictures and specifications.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: GOOD COWBELL
customer_reviews.text: Great sound and cannot get a better one for this price
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All the bell. None of the cow.
customer_reviews.text: Never had a cowbell on my kit before, so I didn't know what to expect. It's loud. It's well muted so it doesn't ring inappropriately. It's exactly what you want from a cowbell.
customer_reviews.author: BS Detector

customer_reviews.title: This is a legitimate cure for the fever
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding tone, nice variations depending on where you strike it, very full sound and projects quite nicely. It mounted easily on my rack system and has lasted a few gigs so far. As I've only had this for a month or so, and only played a few gigs - I will update my review if anything notable happens. Meanwhile, this cowbell is quite tasty.
customer_reviews.author: C. Sutherland

customer_reviews.title: You can always use more cowbell...
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, good price. I don't know much more to say about a cowbell.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Just right.
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound, not too big so it fits with my kit well. Just right for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pearl cowbell for the win!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, great product and great price from a great company! This little cowbell not only looks good matched with my black yamaha drum set but it sounds awesome as well!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.text: Very nice cowbell, fantastic value. With a small foam strip clued to the inside it helps reduce the little ring it has. Still very very good Cowbell.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Christopher Walken should have used this one on SNL
customer_reviews.text: I had a fever, and it needed more cowbell! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Joe La

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, well built, clear and sounds exactly right
customer_reviews.text: Clear and solid, plays great. This one's very well made; suitable for gigging & live performances. Lots of fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Calhoun

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to a drum set for the best price.
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in perfect condition and is exactly as advertised. It was bought as a gift so I'm unsure of the functionality but the individual loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Great sound- great value
customer_reviews.text: Great sound! I hold it to play and it is a little big for that but the sound is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Life is good!

customer_reviews.title: Great cowbell
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, easy to mount wherever it's needed at the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: SOUNDS BETTER WITH
customer_reviews.text: ALWAYS MORE COW BELL.TAKES A BEATEN ,PAINT HOLDS WELL.SOUNDS BETTER WITH ABUSE
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sounding cowbell in my opinion
customer_reviews.text: Good sounding cowbell in my opinion. Does not come with a stick so don't forget to have a "hitting" mechanism if you do not already have one.
customer_reviews.author: Kasey R.

customer_reviews.title: We just like to have a get together and give everyone an ...
customer_reviews.text: We just like to have a get together and give everyone an instrument to join in on some music and have a good time. This thing is fanfreakin tastic! We need more cowbell!
customer_reviews.author: David Waters

customer_reviews.title: great sounds, very sturdy and priced right
customer_reviews.text: great sounds, very sturdy and priced right. no complaints here. it has a more muffled cowbell sound than some of the others i have heard.
customer_reviews.author: pennepacker

customer_reviews.title: ... as a Valentines gift he loves it is sounds great in the price is amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a Valentines gift he loves it is sounds great in the price is amazing..
customer_reviews.author: luisa cuadro

customer_reviews.title: Roommate Gift: Success Again!
customer_reviews.text: Another gift for my roommate. He asked for a cowbell, I got him a cowbell, and he was very surprised that it was a Pearl. Loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Whitehead

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Use it to go ham at my parties, tons of fun
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For $10 you can't go wrong
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a cheap cowbell for my 60's Pearl kit. I purchased this along with the kick drum mounting kit and it does the job. Don't Fear The Reaper!!
customer_reviews.author: S. DOPIERALA

customer_reviews.title: Cow bell!!
customer_reviews.text: ITS A COW BELL ! fit right in thanks Jeff
customer_reviews.author: JBassist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for an addition to my husbands refurbished 1960s Pearl drum set
customer_reviews.author: Misty E

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is I Love it. Perfect size, tone and volume. good price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ram

customer_reviews.title: the sound and everything very well the price is the
customer_reviews.text: the sound and everything very well the price is the best
customer_reviews.author: Salvador

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: Well build product, exactly the sound I looking for, love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cineman Fun

customer_reviews.title: A good rock pop drum set cowbell
customer_reviews.text: A good rock pop drum set cowbell. Quality construction with excellent welds. It is already muted with a medium sized rubber strip inside the bell It has the traditional “tok tok tok” rock pop classic cowbell sound. You can’t lose with this one attached to your drum set. Made in Thailand
customer_reviews.author: R. READ

customer_reviews.title: Great cowbell
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cowbell. It is pretty easy to control how much it rings with proper technique, and it's loud when you hit it hard. It is a little lower tonally than I expected (more of a toonk than a tok, if that means anything), but I can't complain.
customer_reviews.author: Mister Underhill

customer_reviews.title: Kinda low-end clonk when hit with non stick objects.
customer_reviews.text: Kinda low-end clonk when hit with non stick objects. Needs sticks to make the plunking noise more associated with cowbell
customer_reviews.author: Miles P

customer_reviews.title: More Cow Bell!!!
customer_reviews.text: This was a great purchase; Christopher Walken said it best...." Because " Guy's " your gonna want more Cow Bell"......
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: morecowbell
customer_reviews.text: This is a LOUD cowbell that really cuts through, well, anything. I'll have this till the day I die. Not the most musical cowbell, I'd give it a 7.8/10 for tone. Overall good product for the money.
customer_reviews.author: justaregularman

customer_reviews.title: Good Pitch, Solid Construction
customer_reviews.text: Good Pitch, Solid Construction. Sounds very much like the cowbells I remember from a lot of old rock songs. Depending on how you hold it you will get several different and good tones. The mounting base is nice and it will eventually get mounted on my E-drumkit's frame.
customer_reviews.author: electriccafe

customer_reviews.title: MO COWBELL !!
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT! Just right!! The perfect instrument to go with my set, and it attached just right with the Meinl Percussion MC-STBD Standard Cowbell Holder on the bass drum! MORE COWBELL!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Nice bell
customer_reviews.text: This is a very heavy duty bell. The sound is great. I also bought the Gibraltar SC-268R Bass Drum Hoop Bell Mount 9.5Mm Rod. Which work excellent for this bell. Attach it to the base drum.
customer_reviews.author: Lnewby7

customer_reviews.title: Need more cowbell
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect cowbell for my halloween costume! It seems well built and I would assume is of the quality of cowbell for a drum kit. In any case I need more cowbell!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: More cowbell!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice sound. This cowbell is larger than ones I have purchased from music catalogs/sites for my music classroom and the sound is big and warm.
customer_reviews.author: b525

customer_reviews.title: Nice addition for any drum set.
customer_reviews.text: An attention getter in any venue. The workmanship (welding) leaves room for improvement but did not affect the sound quality. More cow bell Will.
customer_reviews.author: Craige P. Keen

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: I don't use it as much as I use to but it produces a great sound once some insulation is added.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Who knew?
customer_reviews.text: I asked my grandson what he wanted for Christmas, and he told me a cowbell. A cowbell? Yep! He's a drummer in a small teenage band. He loved this cowbell. It fit nicely on his drum set and has a great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Annette Perry

customer_reviews.title: The husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: the husband has electric drums and was excited about the cowbell....funny we had just saw SNL and the I need more cowbell skit.
customer_reviews.author: shuggs

customer_reviews.title: Pearl PCB6 Primero 6" Cowbell
customer_reviews.text: Great sound for the price. Very durable. I also bought the Basic Beat 8" rhymthm sticks to use as a beater. Together cost about $20.
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Cow Bell
customer_reviews.text: Now when we get the fever for cow bell, we bring this out, and we finally have enough cow bell.
customer_reviews.author: Ralph L. Reiley

customer_reviews.title: I GOT A FEVER... AND THE ONLY PRECRIPTION., IS MORE COWBELL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cowbell... nice warm sound...overall great cowbell
customer_reviews.author: R. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Nice size cowbell
customer_reviews.text: A very solid cowbell with excellent sound. It is nothing that I would consider cheap and it will last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: JJG

customer_reviews.title: Great pricing!
customer_reviews.text: These prices beat all our local guys and the same quality!!Audience loves it and adds real detail to each and every song
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty dope
customer_reviews.text: Has a pretty good sound and clamps on well, I just wish the attachment hole was larger so I could fit it on thicker rods instead of having to buy another whole overpriced attachment just for this. For the price, though, I definitely think this is a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Clark Robertson

customer_reviews.title: More cowbell!
customer_reviews.text: What do you give a drummer for Christmas? More cowbell! Clamps on to the stands fairly easily and sounds exactly what you think it does.

customer_reviews.title: great price for my use
customer_reviews.text: i need more cowbell ! great price for my use. but if i was a professional musician i would upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Hazelwood

customer_reviews.title: My first cowbell
customer_reviews.text: This is the first cowbell Ive bought. I bought it for a family get together. Everybody loved playing it (making noise) & finding la clave. Its a well made campana.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: no inner piece! great size though.
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited about this cowbell for my husband's triathlons but there is no inner piece to clang against the bell. You need a drum stick or something. So bummed because it is a great size. I wish the description stated you need an additional piece of equipment. Many if the other cowbells indicate additional equipment is needed. I returned it. Customer service was great & processed the return quickly.
customer_reviews.author: L Hunter

product_meta.title: Pearl PCB6 Primero Cowbell
product_meta.description: Style:Primero CowbellOffers the same sound and durability as the Elite series, but at lower prices. Constructed of heavy gauge cold rolled steel, and fully welded using the Argon gas welding method, which creates buzz less performance and improves resonance. Available in two sizes, 4 " and 6 ", which work well as a multi-pitched set!
feature_bullets: Popular sound and excellent sound quality

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
